turns.speaker: WALTER
turns.text: What just happened?

turns.speaker: SHARON
turns.text: Your daughters went to the prom.

turns.speaker: WALTER
turns.text: Did I have anything to say about it?

turns.speaker: SHARON
turns.text: Absolutely not.

turns.speaker: WALTER
turns.text: That ' s what I thought

turns.speaker: ALONSO
turns.text: I never seen heat like this!  Not even in Las Minas!

turns.speaker: SAILOR
turns.text: The water's going putrid in the barrels.

turns.speaker: ALONSO
turns.text: You'll be drinking your own piss... For the glory of Spain... and Admiral Colon...!  Bastard!

turns.speaker: ALONSO
turns.text: What are you listening to, chicken ass?

turns.speaker: SAILOR
turns.text: Ah, leave him alone.  He's doing no harm.

turns.speaker: ALONSO
turns.text: With a face like that?  I don't want you looking at me.  You hear?

turns.speaker: ALONSO
turns.text: He's the devil's child...

turns.speaker: SAILOR
turns.text: We'll all go crazy...

turns.speaker: ALONSO
turns.text: We should have seen land.

turns.speaker: SAILOR
turns.text: We left three weeks ago, Alonso. Can't be that near.

turns.speaker: ALONSO
turns.text: Can't be that far, I say.  Also, I don't like the smell of the sea around here.  Smells like a cunt. Bad sign...

turns.speaker: AROJAZ
turns.text: You say Asia can be found by sailing west?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Yes, your Eminence.  The voyage should not take more than six or seven weeks.

turns.speaker: AROJAZ
turns.text: Unfortunately, Don Colon, that is precisely where our opinions differ...  Are you familiar with the work of Aristotle?  Erathostene?  Ptolemeus?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: I am, Your Eminence

turns.speaker: AROJAZ
turns.text: Then you cannot ignore that according to their calculations, the circumference of the Earth is approximately...  22,000 leagues or more.  Which makes the ocean... uncrossable.

turns.speaker: AROJAZ
turns.text: Senor Colon, an experienced captain such as yourself will understand our concern with the crew.  I am not willing to have on my conscience the loss of men who would have relied upon our judgment.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Excellency, you are right.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Your Eminence, there is only one way to settle the matter.  And that is to make the journey.  I am ready to risk my life to prove it possible.

turns.speaker: AROJAZ
turns.text: Your life, and that of others!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: If they agree to follow me, yes.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Trade, Your Excellency.  According to Marco Polo, the Kingdom of China is one of the richest of the world. Even the meanest buildings are roofed with gold.

turns.speaker: AROJAZ
turns.text: Is that all that interests you? Gold?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: No.  The Portuguese have already discovered black-skinned people.  I, too, will find other populations -- and bring them to the word of God.

turns.speaker: AROJAZ
turns.text: If God intended our proximity to Asia, do you believe he would have waited for you to show it to the world?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Did He not choose a carpenter's son to reveal Himself to the world?

turns.speaker: AROJAZ
turns.text: Don't you realize your words could be considered heretical?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Blind faith is what I consider heresy!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Asia can be found to the west -- and I will prove it.

turns.speaker: AROJAZ
turns.text: IF-GOD-WILLS-IT!

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: The State has some reason to be interested in this man's proposition, Your Eminence...

turns.speaker: AROJAZ
turns.text: The Judgment is ours!

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: Naturally.  But I would really deplore the loss of such a potential opportunity for Spain for a... dispute over a point of geography.

turns.speaker: AROJAZ
turns.text: He is a mercenary!  Did he not already try to convince the King of Portugal of his absurd notions?

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: Indeed.  The world is full of mercenaries -- and states often make use of them, when it benefits them.  My only concern is the welfare and prosperity of Spain.

turns.speaker: AROJAZ
turns.text: It won't be easy to get rid of your prophet now, Don Sanchez.

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: On the contrary, Your Eminence.  It seems to me the man is preparing his own cross.

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: You can see for yourself.

turns.speaker: AROJAZ
turns.text: What a tragedy... what a waste of a life...

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: A waste...?  Let me tell you something, Arojaz.  If your name, or mine, is ever remembered -- it will only be because of his.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: I could be gone for years.

turns.speaker: BEATRIX
turns.text: I know.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: I haven't given you much of a life.

turns.speaker: BEATRIX
turns.text: Well... that's true.  I have a child by a man who won't marry me!  Who's always leaving...

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Are we going to argue?

turns.speaker: BEATRIX
turns.text: I'd love to argue with you sometimes.  But you're never here!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Perhaps I was never meant to live with a woman...

turns.speaker: BEATRIX
turns.text: I find that hard to believe.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: She said yes.

turns.speaker: BEATRIX
turns.text: Thank God...

turns.speaker: BEATRIX
turns.text: I'm not asking you to swear to anything.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: I don't want you to wait for me.

turns.speaker: BEATRIX
turns.text: That's something you can't decide.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Beatrix, I want to ask you something.

turns.speaker: BEATRIX
turns.text: You don't usually ask.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: I can arrange for the Queen to take Fernando and Diego into her service.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: God... you're so beautiful!  I can't believe no other man has ever taken you away from me...

turns.speaker: BEATRIX
turns.text: They tried... but I didn't let them.

turns.speaker: BEATRIX
turns.text: They took everything...

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Not everything... Do you think I care?  I'm a free man again.  Riches don't make a man rich, they only make him busier...

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Can't you stay with us a little?

turns.speaker: BEATRIX
turns.text: I am busy inside.

turns.speaker: BEATRIX
turns.text: What is it, now?  Tell me...

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: I can't keep my eyes off you.  I would like to catch up with all the moments I didn't spend with you.

turns.speaker: BOBADILLA
turns.text: I understand that you will soon be appointing Governors for the islands?  Is it not so?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Forgive me, Don Bobadilla -- those positions have already been taken.

turns.speaker: BOBADILLA
turns.text: May I ask by whom?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Bartolome and Giacomo Colon.

turns.speaker: BOBADILLA
turns.text: Don Alonso de Bobadilla.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Yes... I remember...

turns.speaker: BOBADILLA
turns.text: My letters of appointment.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Appointment to what?

turns.speaker: BOBADILLA
turns.text: Viceroy of the West Indies.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Congratulations.  Then I am free to search for the mainland.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: How far from here?

turns.speaker: BOBADILLA
turns.text: I am not a seaman.  But I heard it is no more than a week at sea.  I hope you are not too disappointed.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: How could I be?  The mainland has been found.  Exactly as I said it would.

turns.speaker: BOBADILLA
turns.text: I am afraid this is not the worst news.

turns.speaker: FERNANDO
turns.text: I want to go with you!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: There'll be a time.

turns.speaker: FERNANDO
turns.text: You promise?  Do you swear on St. Christopher...?

turns.speaker: FERNANDO
turns.text: Do you swear on all the Holy Saints in heaven?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Yes... Yes, I do... On all of them!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: I have to explore the mainland.

turns.speaker: FERNANDO
turns.text: This time with me!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: How are you feeling, Fernando?

turns.speaker: FERNANDO
turns.text: Not bad.

turns.speaker: FERNANDO
turns.text: Father...

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: There must be a passage to that other ocean.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: What are you listening to?

turns.speaker: FERNANDO
turns.text: I am not listening, Father.  But I can't help hearing.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: What does he say?

turns.speaker: FERNANDO
turns.text: He asks when he can come to visit you.  He left his address.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: He never had one... except aboard my ships!

turns.speaker: FERNANDO
turns.text: I want you to tell me everything you remember, Father.  From the beginning.  Everything.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Really?  God... I wouldn't know where to start... and yet...

turns.speaker: FERNANDO
turns.text: Tell me the first thing that comes to your mind.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: No...

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: No?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: NO...!  I have waited too long, fought too hard.  Now you expect me to take all the risks while you take the profit!  No... I will not be your servant!

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: I remind you, Senor Colon, that you are in no position to bargain with me.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: I'm not bargaining!

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: Then you are too ambitious.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: And were you never ambitious, Excellency?  Or is ambition only a virtue among the nobles, a fault for the rest of us?

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: If you won't accept our proposal, we'll simply find someone who will.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: They don't see sin in their nakedness.  They live according to nature, in a never ending summer. The islands are covered with trees, filled with blossoms and fruits. And...

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: Forgive me, Don Colon.  But what about gold?

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: You defend yourself admirably...

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: ... for a commoner?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: But we do have a lack of notaries. You should contact my administration.

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: Don Bobadilla is already a judge, my Dear Don Cristobal.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Good!  We are also in need of judges.  Except there are no thieves!

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: You seem to have a special talent for making friends.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: What...?  Do I have so many already?

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: To rise so high, in so short a time, is a dangerous occupation.  A little hypocrisy goes a long way.

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: All I have to do is call the guards.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Call them.

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: I am not afraid of you.  You are nothing but a dreamer.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Look out of that window.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: What do you see?

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: Roofs... towers, palaces... spires...

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: All of them created by people like me.

turns.speaker: UTAPAN
turns.text: Say not here!  Cuba!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: What is it?  A tribe?  An island?

turns.speaker: UTAPAN
turns.text: Island.  Far.

turns.speaker: UTAPAN
turns.text: You come!  You speak first!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Tell the Chief we thank him.

turns.speaker: UTAPAN
turns.text: Chief knows.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Tell him his country is very beautiful.  Tell him we are leaving men here -- to build a fort.

turns.speaker: UTAPAN
turns.text: Chief says -- how many?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Thousands.

turns.speaker: UTAPAN
turns.text: Why?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: To bring the word of God.

turns.speaker: UTAPAN
turns.text: Chief says -- he has a God.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: ... and also to bring medicine.

turns.speaker: UTAPAN
turns.text: Chief says...

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: He has medicine.  Tell him we admire his people.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: We will work with his people.  We want peace.  Ask the Chief if he understands?

turns.speaker: UTAPAN
turns.text: He understands.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Ask him if he will help.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: You have to find them, Utapan.  Look what they did!

turns.speaker: UTAPAN
turns.text: You did the same to your God!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Utapan, won't you speak to me?  You used to know how to speak to me.

turns.speaker: UTAPAN
turns.text: You never learned how to speak my language.

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: Diego is a bright boy -- a pleasure to teach -- but so serious... Brothers should be raised together, Colon.  Even brothers from different mothers...

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Father, I am doing what I think is the best for him.  And he has the teacher I would have chosen for myself.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: God... That's in a week!

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: That's what it says.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: How did you manage it?

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: With some difficulty.  I had to promise them you were not a total fool.

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: Why do you wish to sail west?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: To open a new route to Asia.  At the moment there are only two ways of reaching it...

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: How can you be so certain?  The Ocean is said to be infinite.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Ignorance!  I believe the Indies are no more than 750 leagues west of the Canary Islands.

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: How can you be so certain?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: The calculations of Toscanelli Marin de Tyr, Esdras...

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: Esdras is a Jew.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: So was Christ!

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: Two minutes... and already you're a dead man.  Don't let passion overwhelm you, Colon.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: I'll try to remember that, Marchena...

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: Father Marchena!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Passion is something one cannot control!

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: You get so carried away when you are being contradicted!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: I've been contradicted all my life... Eternity!

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: Only God knows the meaning of such words, my son.

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: You mustn't give way to despair. You must wait.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Wait!  I've waited seven years already!  How much longer do you want me to wait?

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: If God intends you to go, then you will go.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Damn God!

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: Colon!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Damn all of you!  You all set up theories based on what?  You never leave the safety of your studies! Go out!  Find out what the world is about and then tell me something I can listen to!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: All of them!  Just lies!

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: Colon!  Don't!

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: In Nomine Patris et Filius, et Spiritus Sancti.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Forgive me, Father.  For I have sinned.

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: I am listening, my son.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Father, I have betrayed my family. I betrayed my men.  And I betrayed you.

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: What are you saying?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: I lied.  The journey will be longer than I said.

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: How long?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: I am not sure... It could be twice the distance.

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: May God forgive you...!  You must tell them!  You must tell your men!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: If I tell them, they won't follow me.  You know that I am right, Father.  You trust me...

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: My son, my son...  Your certitudes are sometimes frightening...  Christopher, you must speak to them. And if you don't I will.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: You are bound by an oath, Father.

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: I believed in you...

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Give me absolution.

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: I suppose we're both old men now.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: You'll always be older than me, Father.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: I have to disagree.

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: I knew you would.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: New worlds create new people.

turns.speaker: MARCHENA
turns.text: Oh?  So you are a new man?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: I don't know... I have the impression that I didn't change that much.  I still can't accept the world as it is!

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: I should not even be listening to you, since my council said no.  But Santangel tells me you are a man of honor and sincerity... And Sanchez, that you are not a fool.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: No more than the woman who said she would take Granada from the Moors.

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: The ocean is uncrossable?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: What did they say about Granada before today?

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: That she was impregnable.

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: I cannot ignore the verdict of my council.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Surely you can do anything you want.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: May I speak freely?

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: You show no inclination to speak otherwise!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: I know what I see.  I see someone who doesn't accept the world as it is.  Who's not afraid.  I see a women who thinks... "What if?"...

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: A woman?

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: How old are you, Senor Colon?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Thirty seven, Your Majesty... And you?

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: Do they have such thoughts?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: They come and go as naked as the day God created them...

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: But without your brothers.  Nor are you to return to Santo Domingo or any of the other colonies.  You may explore the continent.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: There is one thing I'd like to understand... Why do you want to go back, after all this?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Your Majesty -- some men are content to read about things.  I must see them with my own eyes.  I cannot be other than I am.

turns.speaker: MOXICA
turns.text: And you say this is an Indian vice? By God!  I don't see any kind of pleasure that would make this a sin.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: The Indians have no such word, Don Moxica.

turns.speaker: MOXICA
turns.text: We lost cousins, friends.  We will wash this in blood.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: If you want to keep your head on your shoulders, you'll do as I say.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: You want a war?  Fine.  We are a thousand.  They outnumber us by ten! Who will you kill?  Which tribe?

turns.speaker: MOXICA
turns.text: We don't need to know.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: We came here to stay!  To build! Not to start a crusade.  In this forest, there is enough danger to sweep us away in days!  So we will be brave and swallow our grief.  And in the name of those who died, we will accomplish what we came for.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: We can't raise the wheel without it.

turns.speaker: MOXICA
turns.text: My horse doesn't work.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Don Moxica -- we all have to work.

turns.speaker: MOXICA
turns.text: You did not hear me, Don Colon.  Not my horse.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: In one act of brutality, you have created chaos.  Tribes who were fighting each other are now joining forces against us!  All that because of your criminal savagery!

turns.speaker: MOXICA
turns.text: Savagery is what monkeys understand.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: You'll be held in detention, deprived of your privileges and possessions.  Until you are returned to Spain where you will be judged. Have you anything to say?

turns.speaker: MOXICA
turns.text: You will regret this.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Due west, Captain Mendez.  And may God be with us...

turns.speaker: MENDEZ
turns.text: God be with us admiral.

turns.speaker: MENDEZ
turns.text: Well... It's the men, Sir.  They wonder how you know our position. We've lost sight from land days ago...

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: And what do you think Mendez?

turns.speaker: MENDEZ
turns.text: Well, I surely know what a quadrant is!  But I've never seen it used at night before.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Come over here.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: What do you read?

turns.speaker: MENDEZ
turns.text: Twenty eight.

turns.speaker: MENDEZ
turns.text: What's he doing?

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: He's drawing an isthmus... He's saying we're on an isthmus.

turns.speaker: MENDEZ
turns.text: We can't be.

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Where can I meet this man?

turns.speaker: PINZON
turns.text: Immediately.

turns.speaker: PINZON
turns.text: You lied!  You cheated!  We're way past 750 leagues!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Six days ago, yes.

turns.speaker: PINZON
turns.text: You must be mad...!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: We have to keep the hopes of these men alive!

turns.speaker: PINZON
turns.text: We're on the verge of a mutiny, Colon!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: You think I don't know that?

turns.speaker: PINZON
turns.text: We're lost!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: The land is there.  I know it!

turns.speaker: PINZON
turns.text: You don't know anything!  Listen Colon, these are my ships, right? So I'm telling you we're turning back!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: And then what?  Half of the water has gone, the rest is nearly putrid! You know that!

turns.speaker: PINZON
turns.text: Jesus Maria!  I should have never listened to you!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: You never did.  You did all the talking for both of us, remember?

turns.speaker: PINZON
turns.text: You bloody...

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: Pinzon, Pinzon... All we can do now is go forward!  Think about that!

turns.speaker: PINZON
turns.text: You tell that to them!

turns.speaker: COLUMBUS
turns.text: You're right.  Let the men decide.

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: Is that the man I knew, Treasurer Sanchez?

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: Yes, Your Majesty.

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: You were right, Don Sanchez... His demands could never be granted.

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: Never, Your Majesty.  Although...

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: ... Into a monk...

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: Yes.  It would be a pity, wouldn't it?  Call him back!

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: Every ship returns with a cargo of sick and dying.  But with no gold! The new world proves expensive, Your Majesty.

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: We weren't expecting immediate profits, were we?  We must have faith.  We must give time for time.

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: ... But there is worse.  He ordered the execution of five members of the nobility...

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: Is this true, Brother Buyl?

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: Then, what do you suggest, Don Sanchez?

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: He must be replaced.

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: And who would you think of, for such a task?

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: I know, I should not tolerate his impertinence.

turns.speaker: SANCHEZ
turns.text: Then why?

turns.speaker: ISABEL
turns.text: Because he is not afraid of me.

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: Are you my attorney?  I'm Emil.  I'm insane.

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: I'm not your lawyer until I see the money.

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: Here.  I have your money.

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: Oh no!  No!  Shit!

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: Emil.  Take it easy.  Stay with me.  Sit down.  What do you need?  What are you looking for?

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: He has the camera!  He took the movie!

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: Don't say anything.

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: Where are we going?

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: I'm coming with you.

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: Yes.  Yes, come with me!

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: I'm invoking rights - this man is represented by counsel.  I'm coming with him.

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: I brought you some letters.  It's really fan mail.  Women mostly.  One wants to buy you clothes, another sent a check. Another wants a check.

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: You bring the cigarettes?

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: Oh, sure.

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: ...delusions and paranoia.

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: I was all of these.

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: Well, you didn't appreciate the severity of it until recently.  No question about that.

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: What about Oleg?

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: Disappeared.  They're looking everywhere.  Maybe he went back to Czechoslovakia.

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: No, he is here.  Shit...

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: Don't worry about him.  Think about yourself.

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: What about my movie rights?  Book rights?

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: Look, I haven't really focused on that kind of thing.

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: What's your cut?  How much?

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: I would say...half.  Half is fair.

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: No.  No way.

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: But it's...

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: Thirty-percent.  No more.  Or I call another lawyer.  This is the biggest case of your life.  Don't try to negotiate.  Thirty percent.  Say yes or no.

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: This is not about money, Emil.  I need your trust in me.

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: What else do you need?

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: I need to know about your background.  I need to know about your upbringing.  Why you're here.

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: Give me another one, please.

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: Tell me about yourself.  What you did as a young boy... what your parents were like.

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: My father always degraded me.  Killed my self-esteem.  And my mother was blind.

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: Your mother was blind?

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: Yeah, she went blind giving birth to me. She went to fucking black market doctor to induce me.

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: Back in the Czech Republic?

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: Yeah, yeah...bad doctor gave her bad drugs which made her go blind.  And my father blamed me for her blindness...

turns.speaker: CUTLER
turns.text: Your father blamed you for your mother's blindness?

turns.speaker: EMIL
turns.text: Yeah, he hated me from day when I was born.  Put it out.  Can you put the cigarette out?
